alert: ⚠️ Unauthorized Individuals Loitering in Parking Lot Near Gate 3
recommended_action: Dispatch a security officer to Parking Lot near Gate 3 to observe and engage with the two unauthorized individuals. Verify their purpose on campus.
explanation: The presence of two unidentified individuals loitering in a parking area elevates this beyond a routine event. This behavior is highly suspicious and presents a potential risk for property crime (vehicle break-ins) or casing for a future unauthorized entry. A high priority is assigned due to the unknown intent and presence of multiple unauthorized persons.
risk_factors: Loitering in a sensitive area (Parking Lot)

source_event.description: Individual lingering in parking area for extended period
